title: Connection Failure to the PVP.net server

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So, Riot. It's happening again. 

I -know- it's not my internet or computer. I was -just- playing a couple of ranked games before this happened. I know exactly what happened, too.

I get out of the ranked game, and it brings me back to the home screen of the league client, with a disconnect warning. I really thought I was done with this but.. alas, I am not. Again, I am sure if it were my internet or my computer, I wouldn't be able to get on any region, but when I do swap regions I can log in fine.

Please get this sorted so I can advance in ranked, please. :(

> http://imgur.com/a/G2mJy EUW acc I logged into just now.
